title: Removing a working set immediately triggers filters in the background
description: Removing a working set immediately triggers filters in the background.
OB: When a working set is removed, the package view automatically refilters in the background while still manipulating.
EB: The package view should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to working sets, including the remove operation.
SR:
1. Open the working set selection dialog.
2. Remove a working set.
3. Observe that the package view refilters immediately.
4. Cancel the remove operation and verify that all changes made to working sets are reverted.
